title: Direct access GARAGES! Dog Run and Enclosed yards!
posting_body: Located near Frankford Road and the Dallas North Tollway, our apartment homes offer unique interiors including plank flooring, large walk-in closets, vaulted ceilings, crown molding, decorative fireplaces, ceiling fans with lights and full-size washer/dryer.
Spectacular amenities include resort-style pool and fountains, pavilion with picnic tables and BBQ, fitness center with HDTV and dry sauna and business center with high-speed Internet.
Covered parking and direct-access garages are available as is WiFi in the clubhouse, business center and poolside.
Attached Garages are featured on some 2 bedrooms...
Please call Desiree for more information!
